documentation.text:
@dev Adds admin inputted address to bandMgrs mapping
 @param bandMgraddress Account address of band manager to be added

@dev Function for when a visitor to the app purchases a song, but will not run if the admin pauses the contract in an emergency
 @param _seller Account address of the band manager who added the song being bought
@dev toggles the value of stopped if run

@dev Adds admin inputted address to bandMgrs mapping
 @param bandMgraddress Account address of band manager to be added

@dev Function for when a visitor to the app purchases a song, but will not run if the admin pauses the contract in an emergency
 @param _seller Account address of the band manager who added the song being bought
@dev toggles the value of stopped if run

addMgr(address).details: Adds admin inputted address to bandMgrs mapping

params.bandMgraddress: Account address of band manager to be added

addSong(string,uint256).details: Band manager input song name and song price into songs mapping

params._price: The purchase price of the song in ether
params._songname: The name of the song being added by the band manager

buySong(address).details: Function for when a visitor to the app purchases a song, but will not run if the admin pauses the contract in an emergency

params._seller: Account address of the band manager who added the song being bought

circuitBreakerPressed().details: toggles the value of stopped if run
